strapiPost.title: Holiday pop-up bar at Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
"Holidaze, a limited-time cocktail bar with a holiday theme, is back with social distancing and a new temporary home at the Walton Arts Center."

  • Last year the bar was located in Downtown Fayetteville and was very crowded. In a pandemic, that situation will not suffice, so the Holidaze team and Walton Arts Center teamed up to execute the themed bar
  • The bar opened November 20, and will remain open all year until December 31, 2020. Times, reservations, and locations can be found HERE
